1120:2: yathā tāvadākāśagarbhasūtre-pañcemāḥ kulaputra kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya mūlāpattayaḥ,
1120:3: yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhoṣayati |
1120:6: yaḥ kulaputra mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastvapaharati sāṃdhikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃdhikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā,
1120:9: yaḥ punardharma pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayati,
1120:11: yaḥ punarmāmuddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā aśikṣādhārī vā,
1120:12: tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyapaharati apahārayati,
1120:18: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitādvayaparopayati pitaramarhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati,
1120:25: anyāṃśca bahūn sattvān daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati,
1120:29: yaḥ punargrāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrābhedaṃ karoti,
1120:32: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃpratisthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇa kuladuhitatṛṇāṃ vā aṣṭaumūlāpattayaḥ,
1120:33: yābhirmūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni kāṣayanti |
1120:37: ye sattvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunā asmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannāḥ,
1120:38: ta itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramagambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti |
1120:39: te ca parīttabuddhayo'pi kulaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti |
1120:40: teṣāmādikarmikā ye ca bodhisattvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti,
1120:41: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisaddaśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrastaḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti |
1120:42: te hyakṛtaśramā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsamāpadyante |
1120:46: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sava pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ kāṣayati vastupatitaḥ parājitaḥ svargāpavargasukhāt |
1120:49: tasmādbodhisattvena mahāsattvena parapudgalānāmāśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānāmanupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā,
1120:52: punaraparamādikarmiko bodhisattvaḥ kasyacidevaṃ vakṣyati-na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartum |
1120:54: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittamutpādaya |
1120:58: punaraparamādikarmiko bodhisattvaḥ kasyacidevaṃ vakṣyati-kiṃ bhoḥ prātimokṣavinayena śīlena surakṣitena?
1120:65: punaraparaṃ kulaputra keṣāṃcidādikarmiko bodhisattva evaṃ vakṣyati-varjayata yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ śrāvakayānakathām |
1120:82: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārtha lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti,
1120:85: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti- vayaṃ mahāyānikā nānye |
1120:94: tataste tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhādetāṃ mahāgurukāmāpattimāpadyante yayā apāyagāmino bhavanti |
1120:95: yathā kaścitpuruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gantu nāvā samudramavatarate |
1120:96: sa mahāsamudre svayameva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt,
1120:98: evameva ye ādikarmikā bodhisattvā mahāguṇasāgaramavatartukāmā īrṣyāhetostadvadanti,
1120:99: tatpratyayātte śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpruvanti |
1120:100: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā īrṣyāhetoranṛtapratyayāṃ mahāgurukāmāpattimāpadyante |
1120:102: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā bodhisattvāḥ,
1120:103: ye te gambhīrāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntā dhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gocarāḥ,
1120:104: tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti paṭhanti svādhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā prakāśayanti-ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhayā buddhā evaṃ ca punarahaṃ kāruṇyahetostavopadiśāmi |
1120:105: tvayā vā punastathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvamatra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi |
1120:106: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama |
1120:110: tatpratyayātsarvatryadhvagatānāmarhṛtāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāmāryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati |
1120:118: āhārārtha sa udāraphalavṛkṣamapahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannamanāsvādya viṣavṛkṣamabhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta,
1120:121: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniśritya mahāyānamavatartukāmā lābhasatkārayaśohetorātmānamupadarśayanti,
1120:124: yayā gurukayāpatyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti apāyagāminaḥ |
1120:129: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyantyanāgate'dhvani kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālā amātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ |
1120:135: tenopadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃdhikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃdhikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇairapahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante |
1120:139: tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti adharmaṃ va dharmamapahāya |
1120:142: yāśca apareṣu sūtreṣu śikṣā upadiṣṭāstā apahāya tathārūpāṃ dharmayuktiṃ bhikṣuṇāṃ viheṭhanārthapūrvakaṃ kriyākāraṃ prajñapayanti,
1120:146: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇāmapyupaśāntāḥ kleśā nopaśamyanti,
1120:157: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti,
1120:159: te ca prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣvavarṇa niścārayanti |
1120:160: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmantike praduṣyati avavyāyati |
1120:166: nādhyayanavaiyāvṛtyāśritā nādhyayanābhiyuktāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntibhūmiṣu bhājanobhūtā dakṣiṇīyāḥ pātrabhūtāḥ |
1120:171: āsāṃ niḥsaraṇamihaiva sūtre'bhihitam-yadi te bodhisattvā ākāśagarbhasya bodhisattvasya nāma śrutvā darśanamasyākāṅkṣeran,
1120:175: teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathābhāgyatayā svarūpeṇāgratastiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa,
1120:181: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti,
1120:183: tenādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena sāparādhena paścime yāme utthāyāsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyam,
1120:185: evaṃ ca vaktavyamaruṇa aruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga,
1120:193: sahodnate'ruṇe iha jambudvīpe ākāśagarbhasya bodhisattvasyeha samāgamo bhavati svarūpeṇa ca |
1120:194: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya svapnāntare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlāpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānopāyena |
1120:196: yenopāyakauśalyena sa ādikarmiko bodhisattvastatraiva bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
1120:200: evaṃ syāt-araṇye upavane'bhyavakāśe vā agaruṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālānusāri vā dhūpayitavyam |
1120:201: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditvā ime mantrapadāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ |
1120:208: murara murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika sarvāśāṃ me sthāpaya ājñādhārī sphu gu |
1120:228: upāyakauśalyasūtre'pi mūlāpattiruktā- kiṃ cāpi kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kalpaśatasahastramapi mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt |
1120:236: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇadhāraṇārthamekīyagatānāṃ ca saṃgrahakārikā ucyante-
1120:259: āryakṣitigarbhasūtre'pyuktam- yo mahābrahman mamoddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣuranubhūtaḥ kaśambakajātaḥ aśramaṇaḥ śramaṇapratijñaḥ abrahmacārī brahmacāripratijñaḥ |
1120:261: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣuradyāpi sarvadevānāṃ yāvatsarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvatpuṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitram |
1120:263: tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena kāṣāyavastraprāvaraṇeryāpathena darśanahetunāpi bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhakuśalamūlopastambhanakaraḥ sugatimārgadarśako bhavati |
1120:264: tasmādyo mamoddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā,
1120:265: tasya nānujānāmi cakravartirājñāmapi yanmamoddiśya pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇāpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptum,
1120:266: aṅgabhaṅgaṃ vikartanaṃ vā kartu jīvitādvā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartum,
1120:268: kiṃ cāpi sa mṛtaḥ kathyate'smin dharmavinaye |
1120:269: atha ca punaḥ sa pudnalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśa ||iti||
1120:270: atraivāha-ye mamoddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā viheṭhayiṣyanti,
1120:271: te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānāmatīva sāparādhā bhavanti |
1120:274: asminneva coktam-tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahastrāṇi bahūni ca bodhisattvaniyutaśatasahastrāṇi bhagavato'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti-vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān pātrabhūtāṃśca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudnalān jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto roṣitavanto'varṇāyaśaḥkathāśca niścāritavantaḥ |
1120:275: tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena triṣvapāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ |
1120:284: kecidvadanti-asmābhirbhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakā apātrabhūtāḥ pātrabhūtāśca sāparādhikāścārake prakṣiptāḥ |
1120:285: tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃstriṣvapāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ |
1120:292: pravrajyāntarāyasūtre'pyanartha uktaḥ-caturbhirmahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati |
1120:294: na jātu sukhito bhavatyabhyākhyānabahulaśca paṇḍakaśca nityadāsaśca |
1120:295: strī ca bhavati śvā ca sūkaraśca gardaścoṣṭraścāśīviṣaśca bhavati tatra tatra jātau |
1120:297: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ naiṣkamyacittasya pravrajyācittasyāryamāgacittasyāntarāya karoti |
1120:299: punaraparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākamaśraddadhat putrasya vā duhiturvā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyaiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyāntarāyaṃ karoti |
1120:302: daśa cākuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ anathāḥ saddharmasmṛtyupasthānādvipākakaṭukā draṣṭavyāḥ |
1120:305: yathāha-tadyathā agniśikhācarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye'gniśikhāmadhyagatā na dahyante saṃhṛṣṭatarāśca nārakeyāṇāṃ kapālaṃ bhittvā rudhiraṃ pibanti |
1120:306: kapālāntaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā jvalitamastakaluṅgān pibanti |
1120:307: jihvāmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidārya abhito'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti |
1120:308: sāpi jihvā bhuktā punarapi saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā |
1120:317: ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti krandamānānām |
1120:318: sūcīcchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti |
1120:325: tatra tairanyairnārakeyaiḥ sahānekāni varṣaśatasahastrāṇi bhakṣyate saṃbhavati ca |
1120:326: sa kathaṃcidapi tasmānyuktaḥ sarvasmādduḥkhajālaparivṛtaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśastatra gacchati trāṇānveṣī śaraṇānveṣī paritrāṇānveṣī |
1120:327: samantata ekādaśabhirarciskandhairāvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ karmapāśabandhanabaddhaḥ samantataḥ śatrubhirāvṛta kāntāramanuprapannaḥ sarvasmānnarakapuñjādadhikataraṃ vyasanamabhiprapannastaṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśamanudhāvati |
1120:329: utkṣiptaḥ punarapi saṃbhavati sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhistībrābhirvedanābhirabhibhūtaḥ |
1120:330: tasyaivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvāṅgaprayaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati |
1120:337: tasmiṃśca pradeśe sahastrārāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi |
1120:338: tasya sahagamanādeva tāni cakrāṇi śarīraṃ prāpya bhramanti |
1120:347: adattādānavipākamāha- sa eṣa duṣkṛtakarmāntacārī alātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaraḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahadarthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtam |
1120:348: tasyaivaṃ lobhābhibhūtasya karmaṇā mohitasya evaṃ bhavati mamedamiti |
1120:349: sa evaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitāṅgārakarṣūrlaṅghayitvā tad draviṇamanudhāvati |
1120:350: sa karmakṛtairyamapuruṣairgṛhyate śastrajālamadhyagataḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaḥ pāṭayate viśasyate dahyate asthyavaśeṣaḥ kriyate |
1120:351: na cāsyānādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhastāmapyavasthāṃ gatasya parihīyata iti ||
1120:352: kāmamithyācāramadhikṛtyāha- eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmācchastrasaṃkaṭānmuktaḥ kathamapyaṅgārakarṣūrlaṅgayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśamanyaṃ prapadyate vitathadarśanaṃ nāma |
1120:356: sa tena dhāvati yena tāḥ striyaḥ |
1120:359: gṛhītvā ca oṣṭhātprabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇamapi nāvaśiṣṭam |
1120:364: yena tāḥ striyastena bhūyaḥ sa saṃghāvati |
1120:365: na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ |
1120:366: atha tāḥ striyo bhūyo vajramapāyomayaprajvalitagātrāstaṃ manuṣyamādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrāstaṃ nārakeyaṃ sikatāmuṣṭivadbhindanti |
1120:369: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutasteṣāṃ bhavetsukham || yāvat||
1120:370: strī vināśo vināśānāmiha loke paratra ca |
1120:376: tasya mṛṣāvādasya phalena tasyāśca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāvainamāhvayanti pradīptāyomayyām |
1120:381: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānāmakṣi |
1120:384: tasyaivaṃ pracaṇḍāṃ vedanāmanubhavato'nekāni varṣaśatasahastrāṇi sā ca jihvā kṛṣyate |
1120:386: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate'ṅgārakarṣūṣu dahmamāno nimajjan |
1120:387: tasyaivaṃ duḥkhārtasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya punarapi yamapuruṣāḥ prādurbhavanti mudrarāsipāṇayaḥ |
1120:388: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakātprabhṛti yāvatpādau cūrṇayantītyādi ||
1120:391: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśānādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti |
1120:396: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiśchittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti |
1120:397: sa ca jighatsārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparistrutāṃ tāmeva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati |
1120:398: sā ca jihvā chinnā punarapi saṃjāyate karmavaśāt |
1120:399: atha sa bhūmau vedanārtaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate kradante |
1120:400: tasyaivaṃ vedanārtasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duḥkhārtasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtamupabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante-
1120:413: yā na satyavatī nityaṃ na cādhyayanatatparā |
1120:414: na sā jihvā budhairdṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā ||
1120:416: abhidhyāvipākamāha- atha paśyati riktaṃ tucchamasārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahu draviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītam |
1120:418: tataḥ sa nārakastenaiva dhāvati yena tad dravyam |
1120:423: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvattathā kartyate yathā sarṣapaphalamātramapi na bhavati māṃsamasya śarīre |
1120:429: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpaṃlāyate |
1120:432: gṛhītvā ca pūrva tāvanmastakādbhujyate yāvatpārścataḥ sarpairviṣadaṃṣṭraiḥ saṃdaśya saṃdaśya bhakṣyate |
1120:439: ekādaśabhirarciskandhai kṣutpipāsāgninā ca mukhanirgatena nirantaraṃ dahyata iti ||
1120:443: yenāśramaṇena śramaṇapratijñena mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītasyābharaṇānāṃ vā śabdaṃ śratvā ayoniśena manaskāreṇākṣiptabuddhinā tacchutvā hasitalalitakrīḍitānyaśuci muktam ||
1120:453: evamapsarasaḥ prārthanayā brahmacaryapariṇāmanānmahāpadumo nāma naraka uktaḥ |
1120:460: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyāḥ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ paṭhayante |
1120:461: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyāmuhyamānān dārakān paśyati |
1120:463: sa tāṃ nadīmavagāhate teṣu bālakeṣu tīvrasnehapratibandhaśokaduḥkhavegāt |
1120:464: evaṃ govaḍavājaiḍakādiṣu prakṛtisāvadyaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ kharataravipākaḥ paṭhayate |
1120:465: tāsāmeva govaḍavādīnāṃ taptāyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati |
1120:466: sa tāsāmudare pradīptāṅgāranikaraparipūrṇe svidyate pacyate bahūni varṣaśatasahastrāṇīti vistareṇa draṣṭavyam ||
1120:472: evaṃ gurūṇāṃ patnīṣu jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāścāparimāṇāśca mahānarakayātanāḥ paṭhayante ||
1120:474: sa nehaiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate,
1120:475: api tu mātṛgrāmaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ nidhyāyan paśyati |
1120:478: ayamucyate brāhmaṇa brahmacārī saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa,
1120:481: evaṃ mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃkrīḍataḥ saṃkilikilāyamānasya āsvādayataḥ apariśuddhaṃ brahmacaryamuktam |
1120:483: evaṃ tiraḥkuḍayagatasya tiroduṣyagatasya vā mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītādiśavdamāsvādayato maithunasaṃyogamityuktam |
1120:485: evaṃ devādisthāneṣu brahmacaryapariṇāmanātsaṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyukta iti ||
1120:486: yataścaite kāmā evaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayamapi gatā evamanarthakarāḥ,
1120:488: sabhayaścaiṣa mārgaḥ sapratibhayaḥ sakaṇṭakaḥ sagahanaḥ unmārgaḥ kumārgo vedanāpathaḥ asatpuruṣasaṃsevitaḥ |
1120:490: na tvamevaṃ cintayasi-kasmāt alpāsvādāḥ kāmā uktā bhagavatā bahuduḥkhabahūpadravā bahūpāyāsāḥ?
1120:492: rogo bhikṣavaḥ kāma gaṇḍaḥ śalyamaghamaghamūlamāmiṣabaḍiśaṃ mṛtyuḥ |
1120:504: kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ carato dīrgharātraṃ siṃhānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate |
1120:505: yāvadnoghātakānāṃ gavāśanānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate |
1120:506: yāvanmaṇḍūkānāṃ satāṃ sarpāṇāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate |
1120:507: dīrgharātraṃ kāmān pratisevamānānāṃ corā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānāmanto na prajñāyate |
1120:508: pāradārikāḥ pāriyanthikā grāmaghātakā janapadaghātakā yāvad granthimocakā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānāmanto na prajñāyate |
1120:509: duḥkhaṃ tībraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukamanubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yaccaturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakātprabhūtataram ||
1120:512: asthisaṃghātaḥ snāyusaṃbuddho māṃsenānuliptaḥ carmaṇā paryavanaddhaḥ chavyā praticchannaḥ chidravicchidraḥ kṛmisaṃghaniṣevitaḥ sattvānāmanarthakaḥ kleśakarmaṇāṃ vastu |
1120:514: tadyathā- cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvadarśāsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ |
1120:528: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi |
1120:538: tadāpi tena svadāreṣvaśubhānudarśinā uttrastamanasā kleśavaśatayā kāmāḥ pratisevitavyāḥ,
1120:540: evaṃ cānena smṛtirupasthāpyā- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpairapi kāmānna paribhokṣye |
1120:541: kaḥ punarvādo dvīndriyasamāpattyā vā anaṅgavijñaptyā veti ||
1120:542: punaratraivāha- bodhisattvena svabhāryāyā antike tistraḥ saṃjñā utpādayitavyāḥ |
1120:548: candrottarādārikāparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- atha candrottarā dārikā samanantaraṃ pradhāvantaṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vihāyasāntarīkṣe tālamātramabhyudnabhya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata-
1120:550: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram ||
1120:552: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāśca te brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śuddham |
1120:553: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginīti saṃjñām |
1120:554: prāsādikāste hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ ||
1120:555: sphuṭāmimāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama cātigandhaḥ |
1120:556: na rāgācittena mayārjito'yaṃ phalaṃ tu dānasya damasya cedam ||
1120:557: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgam |
1120:558: sākṣī mamāyaṃ purato munīndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu mithyā ||
1120:559: yūyaṃ ca pūrvaṃ pitaro mamāsa ahaṃ ca yuṣmākamabhūjjanitrī |
1120:560: bhrātā svasā cāpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayejjananyām ||
1120:561: pradhātitāḥ prākū ca mamātha sarve ahaṃ viśastā ca purā bhavadbhiḥ |
1120:562: sarve amitrā vadhakāḥ parasya kathaṃ tu vā jāyati rāgacittam ||
1120:563: na rūpavanto hi bhavanti rāgāt na raktacittāḥ sugatiṃ brajanti |
1120:564: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmātparivarjanīyaḥ ||
1120:565: kāmasya hetornirayaṃ patanti pretāstiraśco'tha bhavanti rāgāt |
1120:566: kumbhāṇḍayakṣā asurāḥ piśācā bhavanti ye rāgaparīttacittāḥ ||
1120:567: kāṇāśca khañjāśca vijihvakāśca virūṇkāścaiva bhavanti rāgāt |
1120:570: brahmaṇa īśā vaśavartinaśca tad brahmacarya vipulaṃ caritvā ||
1120:574: sukhasaumanasyena ca yānti vṛddhiṃ ye brahmacarya vipulaṃ caranti ||
1120:576: chedaṃ śiraḥkarṇakarākṣināsāḥ pādasya cārcchanti hi kāmadāsāḥ ||iti||
1120:583: strīṣu saktāstathā mūḍhā amedhya iva vāyasāḥ ||
1120:584: mārasya gocaro hyeṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ |
1120:586: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatraiva dṛśyate |
1120:597: atha bālā na paśyanti mohajālena āvṛtāḥ ||
1120:599: bālā nimitta gṛhṇanti vacane darśane'pi ca |
1120:600: uktāḥ paścānna jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ ||
1120:604: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim ||
1120:606: gatvā avīciṃ duṣprajñā duḥkhāṃ vindanti vedanām |
1120:607: uccāra iva durgandhāḥ striyo buddhaiḥ prakīrtitāḥ |
1120:609: uccārabhastrāṃ yo gṛhya bālo vāsaṃ nigacchati ||
1120:610: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam ||iti||
1120:612: tadevaṃrūpairduḥkhaparyeṣitairbhogaiḥ svajīvikārthamupasaṃhṛtairna prabhavanti śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dānaṃ dātuṃ kṛpaṇavanīpakapācakebhyo vaśīkṛtāḥ strībhiḥ strīnirjitāḥ strīnigṛhītāḥ strīdāsāḥ |
1120:613: tenaiva strīpremṇā tasyā eva poṣaṇāya na śakruvanti dānaṃ dātuṃ śīlaṃ ca samādātum |
1120:614: sa tatra raktaḥ samānaḥ strīparibhāṣitāni sahate,
1120:620: ayaṃ mahārāja kāmalolupasya puruṣasyoccārasukhaparamasyāśucau ratasyāsaṃprajanyacāriṇo doṣaḥ | peyālaṃ |
1120:621: śrutvedṛśaṃ tu saṃvegaṃ na teṣāṃ bhavati nirvṛtiḥ |
1120:622: bhūyaḥ kurvanti saṃsarga strībhiḥ sārdhaṃ pramoditāḥ ||
1120:627: punaḥ kupyati rāgo'sya viṣaṃ hālāhalaṃ yathā ||
1120:629: dṛṣṭvā vai atha uccāraṃ gṛddhatāṃ janayatyasau ||
1120:632: raktāḥ pramattāḥ kāmeṣu kṛtvā karma supāpakam |
1120:638: labdhvā kṣaṇaṃ hi sa prājño dharmaṃ śrutvā ca īdṛśam |
1120:640: praśāntaviniścayaprātihāryasūtre'pyaparo'nartha uktaḥ-yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasattvāñjīvitād vyaparopya sarvasvaṃ haret,
1120:641: yo vā anyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhisattvasyaikakuśalacittasyāntarāyaṃ kuryāt,
1120:647: tasya tasmin samaye tatonidānaṃ trīṇi bhayāni pratikāṅkṣitavyāni |
1120:651: yastasya kuryātpuruṣo'priyaṃ vā bhūtaṃ hyabhūtaṃ ca vadedavarṇam |
1120:652: parūṣaṃ vadettkruddhamanā pi yastaṃ kṣomaṃ ca kuryātpunarasya yo'pi ||
1120:654: utpadyate vipannātmā duḥkhāṃ sa vetti vedanām ||
1120:656: koṭīparivṛtaḥ śaśvad bhakṣyate ca śunā bhṛśam ||
1120:659: ekaikasyāṃ ca jihvāyāṃ śatāḥ pañca jvalanmukhāḥ |
1120:663: tiryagyoniḥ sanarakā na teṣāṃ bhoti durlabhā ||
1120:673: punaratraivāha-yāvanti mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo bodhisattvasyāntike pratighacittānyutpādayati avamanyanācittāni vā,
1120:674: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ- vastavyaṃ mayā mahānarakeṣviti |
1120:675: na mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo'nyena karmaṇā śakyo vinipātayitumanyatra bodhisattvāpavādādeva |
1120:676: tadyathā mañjuśrīrvajramaṇiratnaṃ nānyena kāṣṭhena loṣṭhena vā śakyaṃ mettumanyatra vajrāt,
1120:677: evameva mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo'nyena karmaṇā na śakyo vinipātayitumanyatra bodhisattvāpavādādeveti ||
1120:678: āryaśraddhābalādhānāvatāramudrāsūtre'pyāha-yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāndhakāreṣu bandhane kruddhaḥ praveśayet,
1120:679: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bodhisattve kruddhaḥ parāṅmukhaṃ tiṣṭhet,
1120:682: atraivoktam-yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ sarvajāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvasvaṃ haret,
1120:685: atraivoktam-yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān stūpān vinipātayeddaheta vā,
1120:686: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya vyāpādakhilakrodhacittamutpādya krośayetparibhāṣayet,
1120:696: hitvā sa durgatīḥ sarvāḥ śakro bhavati devarāṭ |
1120:703: yathoktaṃ śraddhābalādhānāvatāramudrāsūtre-yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ sattvānāṃ divase divase divyaṃ śatarasamāhāraṃ dadat,
1120:705: evaṃ dadat gaṅgānadībālikāsamān kalpasamudrān dānaṃ dadyāt,
1120:706: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekasyopāsakasyānanyaśāsturdaśakuśalakarmapathasamavanagatasyaikadivasamekamāhāraṃ dadyāt buddhasyāyaṃ bhagavataḥ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣita iti samāropaṃ kṛtvā,
1120:708: yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuhaduhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ daśakuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatānāmupāsakānāṃ divase divase divyaṃ śatarasamāhāraṃ dadyāt,
1120:711: yaścānyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekasya bhikṣorekadivasamāhāraṃ dadyāt,
1120:713: niyatāniyatāvatāramudrāsūtre'pyāha-sacenmañjuśrīrdaśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā utpāṭitākṣā bhaveyuḥ parikalpamupādāya |
1120:714: atha kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittastānyakṣīṇi janayet parikalpamupādāya |
1120:715: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prasannacittaḥ paśyet,
1120:717: yaḥ kaścinmañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣu sarvasattvān bandhanāgārapraviṣṭān bandhanāgārānmocayitvā cakravartisukhe sthāpayed brahmatvasukhe vā,
1120:718: yo vānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāyānādhimuktasya prasannacitto darśanābhilāṣī bhavedvarṇaṃ cāsyodāharet,
1120:720: tathā kṣitigarbhasūtre'pyāha-yaḥ punarbhadanta bhagavan kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā amātyakalyāṇo vā bhaṭṭakalyāṇo vā śramaṇakalyāṇo vā brāhmaṇakalyāṇo vā paraṃ rakṣati,
1120:723: bhagavacchāsane pātrabhūtamapātrabhūtaṃ vā yāvanmuṇḍaṃ kāṣāyakhaṇḍaprāvṛtaṃ parirakṣati śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
1120:724: śrāvakakathāṃ evaṃ pratyekabuddhakathāṃ śroṣyati pūjayiṣyati mahāyānakathāṃ ca,
1120:726: taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramati krīḍati paripṛcchati paripraśnayati,
1120:730: bhagavānāha- tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścitpuruṣa utpadyate,
1120:731: yaḥ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dānaṃ dadyāt,
1120:732: tathaiva madhyāhnasamaye tathaiva sāyāhnasamaye dānaṃ dadyāt,
1120:734: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra api nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet?
1120:735: āha- bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavedaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam |
1120:736: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacicchakyaṃ pramāṇamudrahītumanyatra tathāgatena ||
1120:737: bhagavānāha- yastu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvadyathā pūrvoktam |
1120:741: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrīṃ rakṣāti,
1120:746: śrāvakān pātrabhūtānapātrabhūtān vā yāvanmuṇḍān kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtānapi rakṣati,
1120:748: yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati |
1120:756: nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrairbuddhaiśca bhagavadbhirbodhisattvaiśca mahāsattvaiśca sārdha samavadhānagato bhavati |
1120:757: satataṃ kalyāṇamitrāvirahito na cireṇa yathābhiprāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate ||
1120:758: atha tāvadeva sarvadevendrāḥ saparivārā yāvatpiśācendrāḥ saparivārā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivamāhuḥ- ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhmanāgate'dhvani yāvatpaścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvadṛhapatikalyāṇāḥ |
1120:761: peyālaṃ vayamapi sarve saparivārāstaṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvadṛhapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhirākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ paripālayiṣyāmo vardhayiṣyāmaḥ |
1120:765: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ ca upabhogaparibhogaṃ ca aiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsaṃpadaṃ ca vardhāpayiṣyāmaḥ |
1120:773: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaram ||
1120:775: na cātra viśeṣahetuḥ kaścidupadarśayituṃ śakyata ityalaṃ vikalpena ||
1120:788: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyāprasādaṃ kurvanti |
1120:790: te kṣāntiṃ bhāvayantaḥ kṣāntimadenātmānamutkarṣayanti pramādyanti- vayaṃ kṣāntivādinaḥ |
1120:794: parān paṃsayanti-kusīdā ime bhikṣavo viharantyanabhiyuktāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuñjānāḥ |
1120:812: iṣṭabodhisatvena bodhisatvamavavadatā anuśāsatā vā śāstṛsaṃjñāmupasthāpya avavaditavyo'nuśāsitavyaḥ |
1120:815: na devaputra bodhisattvaḥ kkacideva kuśalamūlāni samucchinati,
1120:820: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pañcanatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati |
1120:821: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu yadi vā manuṣyeṣu |
1120:824: tamenaṃ tathāgataḥ prajānāti-ayaṃ puruṣapudgalo yāvadiyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahastrairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayiṣyati |
1120:831: na hyasmākametajjñānaṃ pravartate katamasya bodhisattvasya bodhiparipācakānīndriyāṇi saṃvidyante?
1120:837: idaṃ ca mayā kāśyapa arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyamānena yuṣmākamevaṃ dharmo deśitaḥ - mā bhikṣavaḥ pudgalena pudgalaṃ pravicetavyam,
1120:838: yacchītraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan |
1120:839: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiguyāṃ yo vā syānmādṛśaḥ |
1120:840: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisattvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā sarvasattvānāmantike śāstṛsaṃjñtpadayitavyā |
1120:841: etena kaśayapa nirdeśena bodhisattvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā sarvasattvānāmantike śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā |
1120:847: iṣṭāmayānmṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāśca kurvanti jinasya stūpān |
1120:848: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarāśayo pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca kārayanti ||
1120:849: sikatāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye keciduddiśya jināna stūpān |
1120:850: kumārakāḥ krīḍiṣu tatra tatra te sarvi bodhāya abhūṣi lābhinaḥ ||yāvat |
1120:859: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ || peyālaṃ ||
1120:864: sarve ca te buddha abhūṣi loke
1120:883: tadyathā vāḍiśikena mahatthudakasarasi matsyākarṣaṇārthaṃ sāmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet,
1120:885: kiṃ cāpi sa matsya udakasarasi bhramati,
1120:886: atha ca punarbaddha eva sa vaktavyo dṛḍhena sūtreṇa sthalagatadaṇḍasunibaddhena |
1120:887: yatsa bāḍiśika āgatya tena sūtrelādhavena jānāti- gṛhīto matsya iti |
1120:888: tamenaṃ sūtrādṛhītvā sthalagataṃ karoti yathākāmakaraṇāya paribhogāya |
1120:889: evameva ye sattvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlamavaropayanti,
1120:891: kiṃ cāpi te sattvā duṣkṛtena karmāvaraṇenākṣaṇeṣūpapannā bhavanti,
1120:892: atha ca buddhā bhagavantastān sattvān bauddhena jñānena saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārodakasarasa uddhṛtya nirvāṇasthale sthāpayantīti ||
1120:896: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisattvenāpi satā navaka āryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ |
1120:915: na mayā pṛthakkaściddharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprayukto mahāyānasaṃprayukto deśitaḥ |
1120:916: tatte mohapuruṣā imaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti - idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitamidaṃ pratyekabuddhānāmidaṃ bodhisattvānāmiti |
1120:917: sa nānātvasaṃjñayā saddharma pratikṣipati- iyaṃ bodhisattvasya śikṣā,
1120:923: apagate buddhotpāde nāsti dhāraṇīpratilambha iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati |
1120:924: nāsti dharmabhāṇakasya dhāraṇīpratilambha iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati |
1120:926: dharma pratikṣipati- dharmabhāṇako na pratipattisaṃpanna iti dharma pratikṣipati |
1120:934: āloko'sya dharmāṇāṃ na suvidita iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati |
1120:936: akṣarasaṃjñayā tathāgataśāsanaṃ nāvagāhata iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati |
1120:939: akṣarasaṃjñayā kaṃcidadhimuktaṃ karoti kaṃcinna karotīti dharma pratikṣipati |
1120:948: anena buddhavacanasamaya ukto nānena buddhavacanasamaya ukta iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati |
1120:951: vadati bhikṣuvī bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā ,
1120:953: atraiva coktam- yasya kasyacitkulaputra tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dharmaḥ pratibhāti yathādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ deśayitum |
1120:954: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi yadyekasattvasyāpi ekaromaharṣo bhavedekāśrupāto vā,
1120:956: tatra mohapuruṣā abodhisattvā bodhisattvapratijñā bodhisattvadūṣakā dharmastainyakuhakā evaṃ vakṣyanti dharmopadeśakebhyaḥ kimete na budhyanta iti |
1120:965: buddhaṃ sa na draṣṭukāmo yo dharmabhāṇakamadraṣṭukāmaḥ |
1120:968: buddhastena parityakto bhavati yaḥ prathamacittotpādike'pi bodhisattve pratighacittaṃ karotīti ||
1120:971: taṃ mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣayanti- prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvena śikṣitavyam,
1120:974: tat kiṃ manyase'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśīrājābhūd yena kapotārtha śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni?
1120:976: bhagavānāha- yāni mayā maitreya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlānyupacittāni,
1120:979: bhagavānāha- tvaṃ tāvadajita ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ śīlapārimitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān vīryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ,
1120:980: tatte mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti- ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayeneti |
